data.1: THE AVARICE OF plenitude keeps you occupied
data.3: But you will come to know soon; --
data.4: Indeed you will come to know soon.
data.5: And yet if you knew with positive knowledge
data.6: You have indeed to behold Hell;
data.7: Then you will see it with the eye of certainty.
data.8: Then on that day you will surely be asked about the verity of pleasures.
